txt.en:
'I have a new mission for you, [placeholder].

'Scouts bring word of the Vale-watch. It is under control of the hobgoblins! These Frost-bound seek to control one of the best vantage points in all of the Grey Mountains.

'We must reclaim the Vale-watch!'
Your mission is to reclaim Bizar-atrâd.\n\nSpeak to Hórin to travel to Bizar-atrâd.
Monsters in this mission will attempt to summon allies to the fight.
You have been tasked with reclaiming the old watch-post of Bizar-atrâd.
DNT - 'When you are ready, my scouts will lead you to Bizar-atrâd.'
'Well done! With Bizar-atrâd reclaimed, we can once again establish a post upon the Vale-watch. It is in our best interest to do so!'
The mission is complete!\n\nSpeak to Hórin for your reward!
The watch-post of Bizar-atrâd, in the Grey Mountains, has been taken over by Frost-bound Hobgoblins….\n\nYour mission is to reclaim Bizar-atrâd.
